code: 'use strict';export function flattenArray(array){if(!Array.isArray(array)){return[array];}var resultArr=[];var _flattenArray=function _flattenArray(arr){arr.forEach(function(item){if(Array.isArray(item)){_flattenArray(item);}else{resultArr.push(item);}});};_flattenArray(array);return resultArr;}export var has=function has(key,x){if(typeof x==='function'||typeof x==='object'){if(x===null||x===undefined){return false;}else{return key in x;}}return false;};
